[C] - You can play Events from Hand without color requirement.
[A] - When a Climax is placed in your Climax Zone, choose one of your Characters, during this turn, it gains +1000 Power.
[S] - BRAINSTORM [(1) REST this card] Flip the top four cards of your Deck, send them to Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, choose up to one Character in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand.

[C] - During your turn, this card gains +1000 Power.
[A] - [Send the top card of your Stock to Clock] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to one Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

[C] - If you have four or more《Anniversary》Characters, this card gets -1 Level in your Hand.
[A] - [Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, send the top card of your Clock to Stock.
[A] - During this card's battle, if damage dealt to you is canceled, you may return this card to Hand.

[C] - During your turn, all of your other [神威なる力　キリト] gains +1500 Power and the following effect:
-[C] - This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
[S] - RESONANCE [(1) Reveal one [神威なる力　キリト] in your Hand, REST this card] Look at up to three cards from the top of your Deck, choose up to one《Anniversary》Character among the, reveal it to your opponent, add it to Hand, send the remaining cards to Waiting Room.

[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, look at up to three cards from the top of your Deck, choose up to one Event among them, add it to Hand, send the remaining cards to Waiting Room. If you added a card to Hand, choose one card in your Hand, send it to Waiting Room.
[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have another《Anniversary》or《Progressive》Character, during this turn, this card gains +2000 Power.

[C] - For each of your other《Anniversary》Characters, this card gains +1000 Power.
[A] - CX COMBO When [人界の守護] is placed in your Climax Zone, if this card is in your Front Row, if you have four or more other《Anniversary》Characters, choose up to one Character or [Alicization] in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand, choose up to one《Anniversary》Character in your Waiting Room, send it to Stock.

[C] - During your turn, all of your other [共に明日へ ミト] gains +1000 Power and the following effect:
-[C] - During this card's battle, opponent cannot play BACKUP from Hand.
[C] - All of your other《Anniversary》or《Progressive》Characters gain +X Power. X is that Character's Level x500.
[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose up to one Character in your Hand whose Level is less than or equal to your Level, place it on Stage in any slot, during this turn, that Character gains +2000 Power.

[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may send the top card of your Clock to Waiting Room.
[A] - CX COMBO [(3) Send two cards from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card attacks if you have [《マザーズ・ロザリオ》] in your Climax Zone, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this turn, this card gains the following effect:
-[A] - This effect activates up to once per turn. When this card's dealt damage is canceled, send the top eleven cards of your Deck to Waiting Room, deal two damage to your opponent X times. X is the number of Climaxes sent to Waiting Room by this effect.

[A] - This effect activates up to once per turn. During the turn this card is placed on Stage from Hand, when this card's dealt damage is canceled, send the top card of your Deck to Waiting Room, deal X damage to your opponent. X is the Level of that card +1. (Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be canceled)
